data.name: Jet Set Corps Demo
data.detailed_description:
Jetpack DEMO is available now.
Two demo levels



WOULD YOU LIKE YOUR OWN JETPACK?

wishlist today
available 11.2020

Jetpack
It`s a come back to simple, fun and challenging gameplay You know from 80`s hits played on ZX Spectrum, Atari or Commodore.
Proper CONTROLS on Keyboard and pad.
And CO-OP MODE You have to try - retro unpretentious fun in front of a TV.



Rescue Colonists and Save Earth from Aliens Attack!
Get ready, mission starts October 2020!

data.short_description: You are a Jetpack Marine. Rescue Colonists and Save Earth from Aliens Attack! Get ready, mission starts October 2020! Jetpack is a tribute to the best times in arcadeÂ games history. Demo includes 2 Warmup levels. Enjoy!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
